Amazing science based information. Courses are set up for ease of navigation and to challenge you. Monthly subscription is amazing and inexpensive. Certificate programs are straight forward and amazing. Added Bonus, you get to watch a lot of Brent Brookbush videos and he drops knowledge like the NY Jets drop footballs.

originalText.text: Brookbush institute have been a part of very instrumental journey for me as a personal trainer . I have use the models and evidence base approach to help my clients overcome issues they face. At the same time I have learned to integrate exercises program for my clients running concurrently with fat loss / strength and conditioning or muscle build phases . My clients love the impact of these integration as it improve their daily functional life ! I look forward to continuing my education at BB !

originalText.text: My experience with Brookbush Institute has been 100% positive. The courses are difficult while also being about as thorough as I have found. The instructor is an excellent teacher, and the videos accompanying each course are worth the monthly membership fee that I pay. The written materials are challenging. However, the material allows a quick link to hundreds of terms that you can click on for a definition or more information. This feature has helped me on almost every course.

originalText.text: I signed up for Brookbush Institute because I saw that I could get my Personal Training Certificate from a trusted source with evidence-based training. It has been huge in my transition into more movement-based coaching with my clients. I love that the learning never stops with Brookbush and the communication has been incredibly responsive when I have questions and issues. I feel 100% supported and heard - just what I want from a service/training provider.

originalText.text: Just completed the CPT certification and every single course was amazing. Loved having the options of doing it at my own pace. The videos and audio voice overs were very helpful for understanding the content. Highly recommend getting your certifications from BI!
